FRBRalias.value: Repeal of By-laws Adopted by Former Municipalities
FRBRalias.name: title

preface.p: To provide for the repeal of redundant by-laws adopted by former municipalities in the jurisdiction of the City of Cape Town; and to provide for matters incidental thereto.
BE IT ENACTED by the Council of the City of Cape Town, as follows:

content.p: The by-laws listed in the Schedule, which were adopted by former municipalities, the areas of which were incorporated in the City of Cape Town, are hereby repealed, insofar as they are applicable in the area of jurisdiction of the City of Cape Town.
Short title This By-law is called the City of Cape Town: By-Law Relating to the Repeal of By-Laws Adopted by Former Municipalities, 2016.

mainBody.p: Note 1: None of the repealed by-laws were originally published in Xhosa.
Note 2: By-laws marked with * were not published in Afrikaans
